content: Acknowledged. I understand that you are a solicitor and construction lawyer with more than 10 years of experience specialising in construction law. You regularly advise homeowners and builders regarding their contractual and legal rights in NSW, Australia, and represent them in all courts of competent jurisdiction. You have also advised homeowners regarding Choosing the Right Builder: Tips for Homeowners in NSW, their contract rights, risks, and obligations, and have negotiated and amended contracts to reflect their intentions.
